positive.review:
Interesting game. lot of strategy and team play. Mostly can play free but there are some benefits in spending. 
Only negative is that spending a lot will help you also more.Sure if the spenders are in your team it's good for you but if they are against you then you are in trouble.
generally I don't like games where you pay to win but i think this game has it's benefits also with paying players. I still like it... and been playing now almost a year.
its kinda like clash and boom beach but vikings and i honestly fw it ive bought a couple packs prob like 40$ plus and its pretty good would recommend
good 3D animation, fair game play and system. Nice to pass your time with this free game.
Very nice game, interactive, and no glitches so far.

If you can understand the game and what youre getting into, this game is awesome and has/had so much potential, they just need to add some more things, overall. i recommend giving it a try its always a good clicking game, but be prepared to dive in and spend
Beautiful graphics, cool Viking atmosphere, and top-notch music. Building, fighting, and developing your city is exciting and keeps you engaged for a long time.
Yes I rate 6this game with one Thumb Up
this a great game
Good game!
My one of the best game
challenging
game is fun
hh

My gambling addict friend said if I post a review and it gets 150 likes and 50 Awards that he will buy me a case of beer, some vodka and 1 kg of lemon So im just gonna leave this here.

Мой друг-игроман сказал, что если я опубликую отзыв и он наберет 150 лайков и 50 наград, он купит мне ящик пива, немного водки и 1 кг лимона, так что я просто оставлю это здесь.

Interesting game. lot of strategy and team play. Mostly can play free but there are some benefits in spending. 
Only negative is that spending a lot will help you also more.Sure if the spenders are in your team it's good for you but if they are against you then you are in trouble.
generally I don't like games where you pay to win but i think this game has it's benefits also with paying players. I still like it... and been playing now almost a year.
its kinda like clash and boom beach but vikings and i honestly fw it ive bought a couple packs prob like 40$ plus and its pretty good would recommend
good 3D animation, fair game play and system. Nice to pass your time with this free game.

The game is beautiful, the tutorial and beginner quests are easy and intuitive. I like the quests and the ease if getting around.

I would like to see more customization of the avatars and their armor choices.

Unfortunately this is a pay to win game, you can play without paying, but there is a lot of advertising to buy buy and buy items each and every day so that before you know it all the packs adding up to a lot of money, and its hard to not buy buy buy to keep progressing fast. Just want to caution people this is the case. It is a very fun and engaging game.. just be prepared to spend spend spend.

A surprisingly engaging strategy game! The progression feels rewarding, and the Viking theme is well-executed. While there's a learning curve, conquering feels satisfying. If you enjoy city-building with a Norse twist, give it a try!
Very nice game, interactive, and no glitches so far.

If you can understand the game and what youre getting into, this game is awesome and has/had so much potential, they just need to add some more things, overall. i recommend giving it a try its always a good clicking game, but be prepared to dive in and spend
Beautiful graphics, cool Viking atmosphere, and top-notch music. Building, fighting, and developing your city is exciting and keeps you engaged for a long time.
After playing the game for 6 months players for the most part are willing to help you in the game if you find the right tribe.

The game has good graphics and great sounded dialogue and a semi decent amount of things to do, But out of all the building city games this one is the slowest and your choice of Hero's aren't really an option since the main hero you get first will get strong semi fast with the game giving he's shards often while every other hero will take decades to finally rank up, very poor design choice there. 4/10
Yes I rate 6this game with one Thumb Up
this a great game
Good game!
My one of the best game
good
challenging
having my own little armys
ITS ok
game is fun
good
great game
Good Game to Play !!
hh
w

negative.review: Just stay away ... another money grabbin mobile game total waste of time, Not sure why is even on STEAM but just stay away
corrupted like every game on the market , people are just blind to it .. smelly perving , hacking  cunts
People with 1,000x times your power come along and wipe out a month work in 10 seconds. If that sounds like fun to you, then it's your game.

If you can pay, you´ll enjoy more, and be more recognizable.
If you want F2P you will find yourself way far behind.
If you hate microtransactions, don´t play the game.
horrible clone of every other game like it
like other pay to win game
Disgusting, laggy, pay to win as much as pay to win gets game.
Just stay away ... another money grabbin mobile game total waste of time, Not sure why is even on STEAM but just stay away
corrupted like every game on the market , people are just blind to it .. smelly perving , hacking  cunts
People with 1,000x times your power come along and wipe out a month work in 10 seconds. If that sounds like fun to you, then it's your game.

Lets see viking rise.... cost a heap of money ( deep pockets ).... not a very active online game... has to much going on at once that cost you a lot of money... way to many upgrades that don't seem to improve game play... very click click with the mouse... if your 10,000 might strong an another player with 10 million might strong attacks you, can end you which cost a lot of money if you don't have resources to cover the lost troops... takes ages to get troops and resources.. upgrades  ( x100 ) on each.. purchases some times you dont get what you order...plus when you pay for stuff you gotta pay a second party aswell for purchases. I think this game is below average 2 out 10 game. only suit people who have time to waste and heap of money.

If you hate microtransactions, don´t play the game.
